data.name: Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story - Tales Of Dusklight
data.detailed_description:
This series investigates the dark and thrilling events leading up to the city of Dusklight’s construction.

In chapter one experience the discovery of the first ghoul at a research facility amidst the frozen wastes of the arctic.

In chapter two follow a mysterious woman, an unknown survivor tainted by the unforgiving world that she inhabits. As she follows a series of mysterious signs that hint towards a secret facility buried underground, enemy combatants and rabid ghouls plague her path to discovering the mysteries of this hidden facility.

Both fully casted with sound effects and foley that are fully spatialised using binaural technology, we bring you ‘Pitch Black: Tales of Dusklight’

Chapter's Included

    Chapter 1: Ohkrana SvetaChapter 2: Beneath the Rubble

Credits

Written by Connor Harrison
Narration by Alessandra Doogan and Matt Watford
Sound design by Connor Harrison, Jordan Barry and Mariana Sousa Aguiar

data.short_description: With a total run time of just over 30 minutes, Tales of Dusklight features two fully binauralised audio books covering the beginnings of this dark and eccentric world. Hungry for more information on the backstory of Pitch Black? This is for you.

fullgame.name: Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story - Episode One
